amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds from being used to enforce application deadlines regarding Small Business Administration disaster loans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being made available to enforce deadlines regarding economic injury disaster loan applications and physical loan applications.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A047) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 213 (Roll no. 61).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A047) offered by Ms. Velazquez.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A047) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 213 (Roll no. 61).
